entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
